body: Nice story, trap hentai always is the best.

@Liquid Yarn If you're trying to use a 14-year old teenager's egotistical reign to justify your sissy fetish you call "transgenderism," you're not going to find many convincing results. If anything he shows how hysterical the whole movement is. Elagabalus was a crazy cultist, and was eventually assassinated for being to much of a degenerate. History hasn't shied away from gay rulers either. Roman Emperor Hadrian & Kaiser Friedrich II are well known.

Another interesting thing is that it is believed by some historians that Elagabalus insisted on being called Lady rather than Lord and said they would give a huge some of money to any doctor that could give them a vagina, which leads some to claim that he is one of the first trans people of the new millennium.  Info about Elagabalus is very cloudy, as their eccentricities caused a scandal at the time, and historians thereafter (as you can imagine) weren't too kin on portraying an openly queer person in the most flattering and unbiased of ways
